file_content.text: Good thing you showed up. Those snipers were surgical with a blaster.
I took care of the snipers for you.
Saw the action from here. Those shooters didn't stand a chance. Thanks for the assist.
Ha! Missed again, you miserable--careful, my lord! Enemy snipers, dead ahead!
Missed me, you sons of--watch it, sir! Sniper team, dead ahead!
Ha, you missed! Learn to aim, you ugly--ah, stay down! Enemy snipers, dead ahead.
You feeling brave? Here--plasma grenade! We're pinned down, but this ought to burn those rats good!
Pop it in their hole and flush them out!
You're dead men! You hear me? Every one of you!
